author: SegmentLinking
body: #### PR description: This PR introduces a duplicate merging strategy for Line Segment Tracking (LST) that extends track candidates by recovering hits from duplicate T5s that were previously discarded. The algorithm iterates over T5 and pT5 candidates to identify duplicates eligible for merging, requiring that they pass a set of selections and originate from different layers. A new kernel, ExtendTrackCandidatesFromDupT5, implements this logic by merging hits from the highest-scoring duplicates into the LST track candidates. About 70% of LST T5 and pT5 track candidates gain additional hits, improving pT resolution and increasing track candidate length with negligible impact on timing. More info: [LST Duplicate Merging.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/24135950/LST.Duplicate.Merging.pdf) cc. @slava77
title: LST: T5-T5 Duplicate Merging
